hero.slogan: Code that shapes minds, not just machines.
hero.description: Oracode is an offline-first educational mobile app designed to teach underprivileged children the fundamentals of coding, systems, and ethics — all in multiple languages.

mission.title: Empowering the Next Generation of Coders
mission.description: At Oracode, we believe that coding is more than just writing instructions for computers. It's about developing logical thinking, creativity, and problem-solving skills that shape young minds for the future.
mission.d2: Join thousands of young coders on their journey to digital literacy

testimonial.title: What Our Students Say
testimonial.description: Hear from young coders who are already building amazing things with Oracode.

brand.title: Oracode
brand.description: Empowering the next generation of coders through interactive learning, community support, and hands-on projects. Code that shapes minds, not just machines.

bottom.copyright: © 2025 Oracode. All rights reserved. Built with ❤️ for young coders worldwide.
